alert.note: Alert for East Becker; Mahnomen; South Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 9:10AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hubbard, southeastern Mahnomen, northeastern Becker and southern Clearwater Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 910 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southeastern White Earth Nation, or 23 miles northeast of Detroit Lakes, moving north at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Two Inlets around 915 AM CDT. Bad Medicine Lake around 920 AM CDT. Long Lost Lake around 925 AM CDT. Zerkel and Lake Itasca around 930 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Upper Rice Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
